    • randomize

      public void randomize(double min_weight, double max_weight, double min_bias, double max_bias)
      Set each weight and bias as a random value in a given range.
      Parameters:
      min_weight - Minimum value for each weight.
      max_weight - Maximum value for each weight.
      min_bias - Minimum value for each bias.
      max_bias - Maximum value for each bias.

    • forwardPropagation

      public double[] forwardPropagation(double[] input)
      Update all neurons in accordance to input layer neurons.
      Parameters:
      input - Values of input layer neurons. Order of parameters is important.
      Returns:
      Values of output layer neurons after forward propagation.

    • mutate

      public void mutate(double chance, double min_weight, double max_weight, double min_bias, double max_bias)
      each value (weight and bias) has a chance to be changed into a random value in a range.
      Parameters:
      chance - What chance each value has to be mutated.
      min_weight - minimum value of a mutated weight.
      max_weight - maximum value of a mutated weight.
      min_bias - minimum value of a mutated bias.
      max_bias - maximum value of a mutated bias.

      public static NeuralNetwork fromString(String str)
      Converts a toString of a neural network back into a neural network.
      Parameters:
      str - The resulting string of a toString function of a neural network instance.
      Returns:
      The neural network.
